metadata.name: Ant Tower
metadata.description:
MicroCosmos - Ant Tower

"The whole is greater than the sum of its parts"

Microstories' first phygital collection “Micro Cosmos” inspired by phenomenal moments of micro-scale lifeforms. The moments of the micro-universe are crystallized by the light that surrounds it, allowing us to experience its unique elements behind the magnifying glass. “Micro Cosmos” narrate  structural similarity between small universe and the cosmos as a whole, the nature of the cosmos may be inferred from facts about micro life-forms, and vice versa.

The story begin with  5 NFTs, 1/1 edition, Physical Kinetic light sculptures and city-scale spatial installations will complete the integrity of the story in both physical and digital world, allows to experience MicroStories’ universe with an immersive dimension.

Owner will also receive an ant sculpture made of gold plated steel.

Duration: 00:28 sec
Resolution: 1920 x 1080 px
Date of creation: 2022
